name: Innoculata
description:
Kalyn has survived in the post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies known as "zees" on a pot farm for as long as she can remember.  After a terrifying encounter outside the "wire", she has to make a big choice. 

Help Kalyn escape the farm, a place where more sinister things seem to be happening...

Scripted and Programmed by Nathan Guan.

Story Written by Jackie Zhang.

Character Art by Darby Machin.

Significant contributions by Ruizhe Jia.

Based on Scott Westerfield's "Innoculata."
